mystikal: sameoldshawn:  and i would be remiss while i had you in the room if i didnt talk to you about shake ya ass.  im sure youre talked out about it...  mystikal:  not really.  i mean that was the biggest song of my career  sos:  is there something youve never said about making that song or something about it or a line in it or anything  m:  i know if it was my choice to put it out as a single i wouldnt have wanted to do it because i didnt think it represented me as you know lyrically the way i would want to be represented.  once they put it out there they definitely proved me wrong.  so okay.  ive been wrong before
